definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: split divide (so Ps 74:13 seems to require [but √ [[פור]] SS is possible], cf. Ar. farfara split, tear, rend; perh. = I.; > Buhl:Lex. shake, quike, citing Ar. farfara shake Aram. [[אִתְפַּרְפַּר]], parpar, cf. NH [[פִּרְפֵּר]]);—

definitions.title: Hithpō‘
definitions.body: . Pf. 3 fs. [[פּוֹר הִתְפּוֹרְרָה אֶרֶץ]] Is 24:19 split or cracked through is the earth (Che:Heb. Hpt. [[פרוק התפרקה]]).

definitions.title: P ō‘êl
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[פּוֹרַרְתָּ]] Ps 74:13 thou [´[[י]]] didst divide the sea.
